title: Don Pedro Dinero
author: Don Pedro Dinero
content: All threads created by the same guy who registered earlier today;Have you heard about the new #SMUZI meme token?Have you heard about the new #SMUZI meme-coin?Heb je gehoord van de nieuwe meme-token $SMUZI?Hai sentito parlare del nuovo token meme $SMUZI?Hai sentito parlare del nuovo token meme $SMUZI?Haben Sie schon von dem neuen $SMUZI-Meme-Token gehört?Haben Sie schon von dem neuen $SMUZI-Meme-Token gehört?Έχετε ακoύσει για τo νέo $SMUZI meme token;Έχετε ακoύσει για τo νέo $SMUZI meme token;Has oído hablar del nuevo token de meme $SMUZI?Has oído hablar del nuevo token de meme $SMUZI?Jeste li čuli za novi $SMUZI meme token?Jeste li čuli za novi $SMUZI meme token?你听说过新的 $SMUZI 令牌吗？Pernahkah Anda mendengar tentang mem-token #SMUZI yang baru?قد سمعت بالفعل عن الرمز المميز الجديد #SMUZIBы cлышaли пpo нoвый мeм-тoкeн $SMUZI?I think the moderators need to take action.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: This could be done by simply clicking on the report to moderators button.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: If a user spam too much, bringing it to reputation board can easily let other users to check how the person is posting, to know if the person is actually a spammer or not. I hope you have reported any post he has that are spam, that is why the report to moderator's button is available on each post to report the post. Having a topic like this, reputation board is good for it.

comments.author: UserU
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on November 05, 2022, 06:46:05 AMIf a user spam too much, bringing it to reputation board can easily let other users to check how the person is posting, to know if the person is actually a spammer or not. I hope you have reported any post he has that are spam, that is why the report to moderator's button is available on each post to report the post. Having a topic like this, reputation board is good for it.Nah, it's just a burner account. User probably gonna get nuked and return with another one.

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: Quote from: Don Pedro Dinero on November 05, 2022, 05:02:52 AMI think the moderators need to take action.Thread starter already deleted his/her thread. Using Google Translate on the same topic in multiple languages is a punishable offence.May be he/she posted in different languages ​​to advertise his own project #SMUZI.

comments.author: krishnaverma
comments.body: He does not deserve a separate thread in meta for himself. You can get him dealt with using the report to moderator button.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on November 06, 2022, 04:17:59 AMHe does not deserve a separate thread in meta for himself. You can get him dealt with using the report to moderator button. Yep, already suggested by lovesmayfamilis and I think OP ought to lock this thread lest it turn into a beehive of shitposters.  They're coming, I can hear them buzzing.Quote from: UserU on November 05, 2022, 08:00:28 AMNah, it's just a burner account. User probably gonna get nuked and return with another one.Yeah, that's the real problem in situations like this where there's no way (or will) to keep banned members from creating new accounts and just picking up where they left off--like naim027 and his alts.  Hopefully this jackweed will just get the message that he's going to be wasting his time and pick another forum where mods aren't as on the ball.
